pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate Machine- And Human-Readable Plot Labels for Experiments // A no-frills open-source solution for designing plot labels affixed with QR codes. It features 'EasyQrlabelr', a 'BrAPI- compliant' 'shiny' app that simplifies the process of plot label design for non-R users. It builds on the methods described by Wu 'et al.' (2020) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.13405.
